name: ReasonDB
description: A 100% native JavaScript client and server database with a SQL like syntax, streaming analytics, 18 built-in predicates (including soundex and RegExp matching), in-line fat arrow predicates, predicate extensibility, fully indexed Dates and Arrays, joins, nested matching, and swapable persistence engines in as little as 45K.

scripts.test: npm run build & istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcov -- -R spec
scripts.build: babel src -d lib && cp src/LocalStorage.js lib/LocalStorage.js && npm run browserify

author: Simon Y. Blackwell <syblackwell@anywhichway.com> (http://www.github.com/anywhichway)
